newsitem.title: USA: Intermedia, Cable & Wireless set deal.
newsitem.headline: Intermedia, Cable & Wireless set deal.

text.p: Intermedia Communications Inc on Monday said it set a one-year deal to allow Britain's Cable & Wireless Plc to resell Intermedia's local calling services in the Florida cities of Miami, Tampa and Orlando.
This will allow Cable & Wireless's U.S. unit Cable & Wireless Inc to offer combined local and long distance service in these markets under its own brand name.

Intermedia provides voice, data and video services for business customers in the east of the U.S. Monday's deal supplements an existing agreement between the two companies, it said. (( Nick Louth, New York Newsroom 212 859 1712))
